pci_projects_project_network_private_vra: You have not yet created a private network.
Deploy private networks supported by the OVHcloud vRack to connect your instances across the globe.

You can instantly create private networks on demand. They guarantee level 2 isolation and are compatible with DHCP service to automatically deliver IP addressing to your instances. Each private network can be deployed in a single location or it can connect all of your project regions together.
Your private networks are contained in your vRack. They can then be connected to other OVHcloud solutions attached to the same vRack, using a common VLAN ID.
Creating a private network with Gateway via the OVHcloud Control Panel
Attach a Public Cloud Floating IP to an instance
A private and flexible connection between your instances
